about_the_game:
Lsz: Last Safe Zone


How Will You Live In A Chaotic World?


Who Are You

Who Am I?

Where From?

Where to Go?

I Have to Explore Outside Anyway


LSZ is a first person shooter game that survives in a post apocaliptic world.

Key Features


  • Single Player
You'll explore the world, find ways to earn loot, return home, and survive.
have manage your stash for survives.
NPC's are humanoid zombies, humans with weapons.
This world is supplied with electricity for the moment.
There are also traders in this world, who can convert to into funds or obtain other supplies.

  • Multi Player(PvE, PvP)
For now, matchmaking support is undecided, and a join to server type multiplayer function is assumed.

Server Considers Implementation By Listen Mode.


example: 1 listen server hosts one world map(player up to 10?)

In the future, dedicated server: considering implementing the functionality of a dedicated server.


example: 1 dedicated server hosts one world map(player up to 10 - 20?)

content_descriptors.notes:
may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages.

Since it will be a survival game with guns and melee weapons, it will include violence and gore.

have manage your stash for survives.

This world is supplied with electricity for the moment.

name: LastSafeZone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 gen9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: How will you live in a chaotic world? I have to explore outside anyway
